definition: surname Yun/abbr. for Yunnan Province 雲南省|云南省[Yun2 nan2 Sheng3]

sentences.english: When the fire engines arrived the ladders reached only to the sixth floor.
sentences.chinese: 当消防车赶到，云梯车只能达到到六楼。

sentences.english: M/V Parrot Lake. I will drop the ladder.
It will be put into use in April 2011.
sentences.chinese: 预计该云梯车将在2011年4月投入使用。

sentences.english: Knowledge is as wings to man's life and a ladder for his ascent.
sentences.chinese: 知识犹如生活的翅膀铸起攀登的云梯。

sentences.english: What is a long ladder used for?
A new OSHA approved substitute for ladders.
sentences.chinese: 一个新的安全操作系统被批准取代云梯。

sentences.english: Now tower built beside the ladder, you can climb themselves up.
sentences.chinese: 现在塔旁建有云梯，可以攀援而上。

sentences.english: They all stood around the hook and ladders, arguing about how to put out the fire.
sentences.chinese: 他们都站在云梯消防车周围，为灭火方式争论不休。

sentences.english: Chief Ford stood on the top of a hook and ladder.
sentences.chinese: 福特队长站在云梯消防车上。

definition: iron hook at the end a long pole
cheval de frise (a type of barrier)
(old) stones that can be rolled down onto an attacking enemy
